verbose_text: The Agrobacterium cell (harboring the pEGAD-AnnAt8 construct) suspension was infiltrated in tobacco leaves (Nicotiana tabacum Linn cultivar Samsun) and GFP expression was visualized under the confocal microscope (Carl Zeiss LSM 710 NLO ConfoCor 3, Germany) at 480 to 515 nm wavelength after a 48 h incubation period, according to Kumar and Kirti [XREF_BIBR].
